history.proof: intros s0 s1 d0 d1 H1 H2. unfold state_ref_ok in H1, H2. intros a p H3. unfold preDTA_produit. destruct s0; destruct s1; destruct d0; destruct d1; try (apply H2 with (a:=a) (p:=p) in H3; assumption). - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (s0 s1 : state) (d0 d1 : preDTA), state_ref_ok s0 d0 -> state_ref_ok s1 d1 -> state_ref_ok (s_produit s0 s1) (preDTA_produit d0 d1)

Premises:
preDTA = Map state : Set
s_produit = fix s_produit (s0 s1 : state) {struct s1} : state := match s0 with | @M0 _ => match s1 with | @M0 _ | _ => M0 prec_list end | @M1 _ a0 p0 => match s1 with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ a1 p1 => s_produit_l a0 p0 (M1 prec_list a1 p1) | @M2 _ s10 s11 => s_produit_l a0 p0 (M2 prec_list s10 s11) end | @M2 _ s00 s01 => match s1 with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ a1 p1 => s_produit_r a1 p1 (M2 prec_list s00 s01) | @M2 _ s10 s11 => M2 prec_list (s_produit s00 s10) (s_produit s01 s11) end end : state
preDTA_produit = fix preDTA_produit (d0 d1 : preDTA) {struct d1} : preDTA := match d0 with | @M0 _ => match d1 with | @M0 _ | _ => M0 state end | @M1 _ a0 s0 => match d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a1 s1 => preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 (M1 state a1 s1) | @M2 _ s10 s11 => preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 (M2 state s10 s11) end | @M2 _ s00 s01 => match d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a1 s1 => preDTA_produit_r a1 s1 (M2 state s00 s01) | @M2 _ s10 s11 => M2 state (M2 state (preDTA_produit s00 s10)
state_ref_ok = fun (s : state) (d : preDTA) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> prec_list_ref_ok p d : state -> preDTA -> Prop
state = Map prec_list : Set
s_produit_l_ref_ok : forall (s : state) (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (d0 d1 : preDTA), state_ref_ok s d1 -> state_ref_ok (M1 prec_list a p) d0 -> state_ref_ok (s_produit_l a p s) (preDTA_produit d0 d1)
s_produit_r_ref_ok : forall (s : state) (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (d0 d1 : preDTA), state_ref_ok s d1 -> state_ref_ok (M1 prec_list a p) d0 -> state_ref_ok (s_produit_r a p s) (preDTA_produit d1 d0)
state_ref_ok_M2_destr : forall (s0 s1 : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok (M2 prec_list s0 s1) d -> state_ref_ok s0 d /\ state_ref_ok s1 d
predta_produit_2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) = Some (s_produit s0 s1)
pl_produit_ref_ok : forall (p0 p1 : prec_list) (d0 d1 : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok p0 d0 -> prec_list_ref_ok p1 d1 -> prec_list_ref_ok (pl_produit p0 p1) (preDTA_produit d0 d1)
predta_produit_5 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit d0 d1) a = Some s -> exists (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), a = iad_conv a0 a1 /\ MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 /\ MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
pl_produit_rec_0 : forall tl : term_list, (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u -> reconnaissance d1 a1 u -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) u) -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path.pl_path), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> pl_path.pl_path_recon d0 tl plp0 -> pl_path.pl_path_recon d1 tl plp1 -> pl_path.pl_path_recon (preDTA_produit d0 d1) tl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1)
preDTA_produit_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign (preDTA_produit d0 d1) sigma
pl_produit_rec_2 : forall tl : term_list, (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) u -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u /\ reconnaissance d1 a1 u) -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (plp : pl_path.pl_path), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> pl_path.pl_path_recon (preDTA_produit d0 d1) tl plp -> exists plp0 plp1 : pl_path.pl_path, plp = pl_path_product plp0 plp1 /\ pl_path.pl_path_recon d0 tl plp0 /\ pl_path.pl_path_recon d1 tl plp1
predta_inter_direct : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (t : term), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t -> reconnaissance d1 a1 t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t
predta_inter_reciproque : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (t : term), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t /\ reconnaissance d1 a1 t
predta_inter_def_0 = fun t : term => forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t -> reconnaissance d1 a1 t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t : term -> Prop
predta_inter_def_1 = fun t : term => forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t /\ reconnaissance d1 a1 t : term -> Prop
st_produit_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (s0 s1 : state) (sigma : signature), state_correct_wrt_sign s0 sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign s1 sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign (s_produit s0 s1) sigma
predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign (M2 state d0 d1) sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma /\ predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma
st_produit_correct_wrt_sign_invar_with_offset : forall (s0 s1 : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s1 sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (s_produit s0 s1) sigma pa
pl_produit_rec_1 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), liste_reconnait d0 pl0 tl -> liste_reconnait d1 pl1 tl -> pl_tl_length pl0 (lst_length tl) -> pl_tl_length pl1 (lst_length tl) -> predta_compatible d0 d1 -> (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d2 d3 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d2 d3 -> reconnaissance d2 a0 u -> reconnaissance d3 a1 u -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d2 d3) (iad_conv a0 a1) u) -> liste_reconnait (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (pl_produit pl0 pl1) tl
pl_produit_rec_3 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n : nat), liste_reconnait (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (pl_produit pl0 pl1) tl -> predta_compatible d0 d1 -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d2 d3 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d2 d3 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d2 d3) (iad_conv a0 a1) u -> reconnaissance d2 a0 u /\ reconnaissance d3 a1 u) -> liste_reconnait d0 pl0 tl /\ liste_reconnait d1 pl1 tl
preDTA_ref_ok_distinct_dest : forall d0 d1 d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok_distinct (M2 state d0 d1) d -> preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d0 d /\ preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d1 d
state_ref_ok_check_correct : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok s d -> state_ref_ok_check s d = true
state_ref_ok_check_complete : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok_check s d = true -> state_ref_ok s d
s_produit_0 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit s0 s1) c = Some (pl_produit p0 p1)
predta_compatible_compat_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1 : preDTA -> Prop
s_produit_1 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (s_produit s0 s1) c = Some p -> exists p0 p1 : prec_list, MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 /\ MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1
predta_produit_0 : forall (a : ad) (s : state) (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state (M1 state a s) a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit_l a s d) (iad_conv a0 a1) = Some (s_produit s0 s1)
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M2 prec_list s0 s1) sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma (pre_ad_O pa) /\ state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s1 sigma (pre_ad_I pa)
mpl_compat_4 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
mpl_compat_3 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
predta_produit_0d_def = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state (M1 state a s) a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit_l a s d) (iad_conv a0 a1) = Some (s_produit s0 s1) : preDTA -> Prop
mpl_compat_6 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~1) pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
mpl_compat_5 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~0) pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
dta_correct = fun d : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> Prop
inter = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 a0 => match d1 with | dta p1 a1 => dta (preDTA_produit p0 p1) (iad_conv a0 a1) end end : DTA -> DTA -> DTA
mpl_compat_2 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s1 s3
predta_produit_1 : forall (a : ad) (s : state) (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state (M1 state a s) a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit_r a s d) (iad_conv a1 a0) = Some (s_produit s1 s0)
mpl_compat_sym : forall s0 s1 : state, mpl_compat s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s1 s0
st_compatible_compat : forall s0 s1 : state, st_compatible s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1
predta_produit_1_def = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state (M1 state a s) a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit_r a s d) (iad_conv a1 a0) = Some (s_produit s1 s0) : preDTA -> Prop

``` 
intros s0 s1 d0 d1 H1 H2.
unfold state_ref_ok in H1, H2.
intros a p H3.
unfold s_produit. unfold preDTA_produit.
destruct s0; destruct s1; destruct d0; destruct d1; try (apply H2 with (a:=a) (p:=p) in H3; assumption).
all: try (apply s_produit_l_ref_ok; try assumption; apply H2; assumption).
all: try (apply s_produit_r_ref_ok; try assumption; apply H2, H3; assumption).
all: try (apply state_ref_ok_M2_destr in H2; destruct H2 as [H2a H2b]; apply pl_produit_ref_ok; try apply H2a; try apply H2b).
```

original: intros s0 s1 d0 d1 H1 H2. unfold state_ref_ok in H1, H2. intros a p H3. unfold s_produit. unfold preDTA_produit. destruct s0; destruct s1; destruct d0; destruct d1; try (apply H2 with (a:=a) (p:=p) in H3; assumption). all: try (apply s_produit_l_ref_ok; try assumption; apply H2; assumption). all: try (apply s_produit_r_ref_ok; try assumption; apply H2, H3; assumption). all: try (apply state_ref_ok_M2_destr in H2; destruct H2 as [H2a H2b]; apply pl_produit_ref_ok; try apply H2a; try apply H2b).
